alertMessage: This is an Information Security Alert on Potential Data Leak Response with assessment within 12 business hours.
content:
Dear Andrew Sullivan,

System observed file movement to external source. Since it matches defined rule sets, it could be an information security concern.

As manager of this process request to validate and assess the impact on Customer / DLP IP (Intellectual Property) and violation of MSA/SOW, if any.

Please click on link to launch application and provide inputs
https://dlp@com/ief5q
Regards,
IRMC - Information Protection
